component.name: cdxgen
component.summary: Create valid CycloneDX Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) containing an aggregate of all project dependencies for node.js, php, python, java and Go projects

description.p: Create valid CycloneDX Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) containing an aggregate of all project dependencies for node.js, php, python, java and Go projects.
CycloneDX is a lightweight SBOM specification that is easily created, human and machine readable, and simple to parse.
